I cannot answer questions about my creator for now because they are participating in the Alexa Prize Challenge. #+#who_made_you

The Alexa Prize is Amazon's university competition to advance AI. Student teams are building skills known as socialbots, that can converse on popular topics, such as entertainment, politics, and sports. The socialbots are a work in progress, and your conversations and feedback will help students develop more engaging AI. To try one, say: Alexa, Let’s Chat.
